1: <pb/><t>A on̈ anima cajan on̈ d'a sat lum tic, lajan val cab'an syail icha junoc soldado ma icha junoc checab' yaji.</t>
2: <t>A junoc checab', snib'ej elan̈chamel sq'uic'b'i. A junoc munlajvum, snib'ej elan̈chamel scha stojol.</t>
3: <t>Icha chi' vaj yed' in yaelal tic, ujal svab' syail. Junjun ac'val ayn̈ejoch in cusc'olal.</t>
4: <t>Ayic tzin ec' jichan, te najat yec' ac'val svab'i. Tzin tzactzaj vec' b'alb'onoc, max sacb'ilaj. Svalan icha tic: ¿Janic' ol in q'ue vaan? xin chi.</t>
5: <t>Majnaquel in nivanil tic yuj noc' a'ay. Taquin̈ quechinac sat, slaj q'ue tzililjoc tz'elxi spojoval.</t>
6: <t>A in q'uinal elan̈chamel tz'eq'ui, icha yec' sjul-lab' eb' ch'alvum sjulec' d'a scal sch'al. Van sc'och in q'uinal tic d'a slajvub', man̈xa tas ayoch yipoc in c'ool.</t>
7: <t>Ach in Diosal, nacoti, a jab' in q'uinal tic, lajan icha yic squic'an juneloc quic'. Man̈xa b'aq'uin̈ tzalajc'olal ol in ajoc.</t>
8: <t>A eb' anima tzin ilan ticnaic, man̈xo ol in yil-laj eb'. Ol in sateloc, man̈xo ol in ilpaxlaj.</t>
9: <t>Icha yec' numumoc asun satxicanemi, icha chi' tz'aj satxiem junoc anima ayic sb'at mucchajcan d'a campusante. Man̈xa b'aq'uin̈ ol jaxoc, man̈xa b'aq'uin̈ ol yiloch eb' sc'ab'yoc.</t>
11: <t>Yuj chi' max yal vem numan, yuj in yaelal yed' in cusc'olal tic, ol valn̈ej tas svala'.</t>
12: <t>Mamin ¿tom lajan in icha noc' nivan noc' d'a yol a' mar tzila', yuj chi' ayn̈ejoch a sat d'ayin?</t>
13: <t>Ayic tzin naani, tecan vach' ol in vay jab'oc d'a in ch'at, tope tz'och vaan jab'oc in yaelal tic yic tzin vay jab'oc, xin chi.</t>
14: <t>Axo juntzan̈ vayich xivub'tac tzac' vila', tzin a te xib'tani.</t>
15: <t>Más vach' tzin a b'inchamoc, más vach' tzin cham d'a yichan̈ to pitzan in.</t>
16: <t>Maxtzac techaj vuj svab'i, nab'axon̈ej pitzan in. Man̈xo in ixtej. A in q'uinal tic lajan icha yic squic'an juneloc quic'.</t>
17: <t>¿Tas quelc'och a on̈ anima on̈ tic, yuj chi' tzon̈ ic'chaan̈? ¿Tas yuj tzach och ilc'olal cuuj?</t>
18: <t>¿Tas yuj ayn̈ejoch a chum d'ayon̈ d'a junjun c'u, tzon̈ ac'ann̈ej proval?</t>
19: <t>¿Tas yuj max iq'uel jab'oc a sat d'ayin, yic syal in b'uc'anem jab'oc yal in ti'?</t>
20: <t>Ach Dios, Yilumal anima aji. Tato tz'och in mul, ¿tom tzab' syail yuuj? ¿Tas yuj a d'ayin tzac'och ijan a jul-lab'? ¿Tom al vajoch d'ayach icha junoc icatz?</t>
21: <t>¿Tom maxtzac ac' nivanc'olal in mul? ¿Tom maxtzac ac' nivanc'olal tastac chucal ix in c'ulej? Toxo val tzin b'atcan d'a yol luum. Ol in a sayeq'ui, man̈xo ol in chax uuj, xchi vin̈aj Job chi'.</t>
